name: White Bread
recipeInstructions: 1. Put a little warm water in a small mixing bowl. Add the sugar and yeast, and whisk until dissolved.
2. Put the flour in a large mixing bowl, and add the salt.
3. When the yeast mixture is frothy, add to the flour, and mix with a wooden spoon.
4. Add the oil and mix again.
5. Add enough water (very little) to make the mixture a stiff dough.
6. Knead for 10 minutes on a clean surface.
7. Wash the bowl, dry, and lightly oil.
8. Return the dough to the bowl and leave to rest until it has doubled in size (about 45 minutes).
9. Knock down, break into 8 rolls and put on a lightly oiled baking tray. Leave to rise until doubled in size (about 30 minutes).
10. Cook on Gas 7 for 8 to 10 minutes.
